subject: Problem with brake pedal
description_text:
Hi Simsonn,

I just bought this pedal 4 months ago. Everything worked well until today. I noticed that the brake pedal has some problem (in the video). I tried to restart and update the software but the problem is still there. What should I do and how do I fix it?

Hope to hear from you soon
Wan

conversations.body_text: Hi nguyen wan, If this happens, it indicates that the computer’s grounding is not reliable, possibly because a three-prong plug was not used with a three-prong wall outlet. You can refer to the post below: connect the computer case to the stand, and connect the control box to the metal screws on the pedals. This should resolve the disconnection issue. https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding

Hi,

Just followed your guide and fixed the problem.
Thank you
